text:
Running a test script with more than 1 thread pumping HTTP posts to a Tomcat 
server, Tomcat receives about 1% of the posts without parameters (that should 
be there). 
Strangely enough this behaviour is not exhibited on JDK1.4.1
With just one thread active there is no problem on either JDK.
creator: w.riezebos@genimen.com

text:
I guess I need to ask: which JDK does this happen in?  And, I suspect this may
be fixed in the latest code.  Can you verify?
creator: mstover1@apache.org
w.riezebos@genimen.com
text:
As the header suggests: this is on JDK1.3.1
Currently I can not verify if the problem is fixed in the latest release; the 
testbed is not available at the moment..
I can say the problem occurred at a dozen machine's all on the same JDK..
Hope this helps..

Wido

creator: mstover1@apache.org
text:
I don't see this at all.  I'm assuming it's fixed in the nightlies.  Reopen if
you can verify it's not.
